hero_greeting: Hi! I'm Carlos, a frontend developer passionate about clear, functional interfaces with personality.
hero_description: I am passionate about creating clear, accessible, and user-centric interfaces. I work with a practical approach, prioritizing usability, structure, and attention to detail. I enjoy continuous learning, optimizing processes, and transforming complex ideas into simple and functional experiences.
project_roquetes_desc: Official website for the Roquetes City Council (Baix Ebre), created with WordPress + Divi.
project_organizer_desc: Bash script that automatically classifies files by extension into organized folders.
skills_soft_list: Organization • Communication • Problem solving • Attention to detail • Teamwork • Time management • Flexibility • Empathy
